data.actual_result: Discord crash and restarts (but that new settings is applied successfully)
data.expected_result: Discord changes the setting successfully without crash
data.short_description: If experimental is selected in audio subsystem, the client will crash and restarts when switching microphone devices
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you installed more than one (or two) microphone devices (not sure if virtual device counts) - Go to User Settings > Voice & Video > use Voice Activity - Still in same settings, go to Audio subsystem and select experimental, press okay and let Discord do its reload (if its already in experimental, do reload manually by pressing Ctrl + R) - Go to User Settings > Voice & Video and switch microphone devices a few times
